posts.post_content:
Fills a niche. A very small, terribly awkward to find and almost universally unvisited niche, but it fills it...
  
   
Not sure if this would ever have been considered useful enough to dedicate a deck slot to.

posts.post_content: I can just about guarantee we will see, not a functional reprint, but a straight up UPGRADED version of this in Innistrad. Instant speed, plus the usual pay either life or cards as a 'drawback'. Discarding your own flashback cards to get rid of all of theirs would be very nicely evil. Instant speed graveyard axing is much safer than instant speed hand discarding, which is why I think they are willing to do it.
